oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Madison Campbell letter to Thomas S. Snapp
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Correspondence from Madison Campbell, Co. H, 5th Tenn. (McKenzie's) Cav. Regt., CSA, to Thomas S. Snapp, Co. H, 5th Tenn. (McKenzie's) Cav. Regt., CSA, requesting that Snapp give testimony of Campbell's service. Snapp was born in Greene County,; Tenn., in 1843. He was married to Susannah Josephine Stephens. He died on December 10, 1916, and is buried in Zion Presbyterian Church Cemetery in Greeneville, Tennessee.
